title: zooboomafoo1234
author: zooboomafoo1234
content: The Kii Foundation, in partnership with NuID, is launching the identity utility token Kii ($Kii) in September of 2022. Kii will be the transactional token at the root of NuID’s decentralized identity ecosystem that enables user-owned & user-controlled digital identity.NuID is a technology partner of The Kii Foundation, and is known for building a trustless authentication solution for enterprises and developers. The solution leverages zero knowledge proofs and distributed ledger technology, preventing the need for applications or platforms to store user login credentials server-side. Read more about the solution in the Protocol White Paper: https://nuid.io/pdf/nuid-white-paper.pdf. NuID has built upon their existing authentication solution to launch the Nu Identity Ecosystem along with the identity-optimized KiiChain ledger, which is in development. The decentralized ecosystem will include participation from services and individuals alike. Owning Kii will grant you access to this ecosystem, which will provide portable, frictionless, secure management and verification of digital identities. Identity on the internet as it exists now is composed of identity silos, with each platform requiring users to have a unique set of credentials.The Nu Identity Ecosystem will eliminate these silos, as individuals will have portable identity verification that can be shared to any enterprise or platform that deploys the NuID trustless authentication solution: the first of many live services in the ecosystem.Individuals who own Kii can participate in the ecosystem, as Kii will pay the cost of registering credentials, issuing data attestations on a public blockchain, and paying for future identity-use cases.Kii Details:Kii will be launched as an ERC20 token before migrating to the identity-optimized KiiChain ledger in the near future.Kii’s public sale price is $0.30 USD. You can request now to pre-purchase at $0.15 USD.Owning Kii grants you access to the identity ecosystem, where individuals own and control their online identity without trusting services with their private information.How To Purchase:Kii’s public offering is in September, and the Nu Identity Ecosystem & the KiiChain are in development. Find details on where and how to purchase Kii, or request to pre-purchase, at https://kiichain.org/  and Telegram: https://t.me/+qgQofhNKdMgxNzQ5 Find NuID at their website https://nuid.io/In the press: https://www.techtimes.com/articles/276939/20220620/the-nuid-ecosystem-a-path-to-self-sovereign-digital-identity.htm
